{# render #} ## AND {% a1 := 20 %}{{ a1 and a1 }} {% a2 := "something" %}{{ a2 and a2 }} {% a4 := "" %}{{ a4 and a4 }} ## OR {% o1 := 20 %}{{ o1 or o1 }} {% o2 := "something" %}{{ o2 or o2 }} {% o4 := "" %}{{ o4 or o4 }} ## NOT {% n1 := 4 %}{{ not n1 }} {% n2 := 0 %}{{ not n2 }} {% n3 := 0 %}{{ not not n3 }} ## MISC {% m1 := 4 %}{% m2 := "hello" %} {{ m1 and m2 }} {{ m1 and not m2 }} {{ not m1 and not m2 }} {{ m1 and true or not m2}} ## INTERFACES {{ true and interface{}(nil) }} nil {{ true and interface{}(10) }} 10 {{ true and interface{}("") }} "" {{ true and interface{}("hello") }} "hello" {{ true and interface{}([]int{1, 2, 3}) }} []int{1, 2, 3} {{ true and interface{}([]int{}) }} []int{} {{ true and interface{}([]int(nil))}} []int(nil) {{ interface{}(nil) or false }} nil {{ interface{}(10) or false }} 10 {{ interface{}("") or false }} "" {{ interface{}("hello") or false }} "hello" {{ interface{}([]int{1, 2, 3}) or false }} []int{1, 2, 3} {{ interface{}([]int{}) or false }} []int{} {{ interface{}([]int(nil)) or false }} []int(nil) {{ not not interface{}(nil) }} nil {{ not not interface{}(10) }} 10 {{ not not interface{}("") }} "" {{ not not interface{}("hello") }} "hello" {{ not not interface{}([]int{1, 2, 3}) }} []int{1, 2, 3} {{ not not interface{}([]int{}) }} []int{} {{ not not interface{}([]int(nil)) }} []int(nil)
